    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_399</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_399</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">La parábola</string>
            <string language="en">The parabola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Parabel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La parabole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A parábola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La parabola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η παραβολή</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el estudio gráfico de la función cuadrática de una variable. Se estudia la gráfica de la parábola a partir de su ecuación canónica y se va modificando su gráfica mediante traslaciones, dilataciones, etc.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to carry out a graphical study of quadratic functions of a real variable. The graph of the canonical equation of the parabola is studied and it is modified by means of translations, dilations, etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">vértice</string>
            <string language="en">vertex</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">traslación</string>
            <string language="en">translation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">parábola</string>
            <string language="en">parabola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">curva</string>
            <string language="en">curve</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, eine graphische Studie der quadratischen Funktionen 
einer realen Variable durchzuführen. Das Diagramm der 
kanonischen Gleichung der Parabel wird studiert und es wird mittels 
der Übersetzungen, der Ausdehnungen, usw. geändert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'effectuer une étude graphique des fonctions 
quadratiques d'une vraie variable. Le graphique de l'équation 
canonique de la parabole est étudié et il est modifié au moyen de 
traductions, dilatations, etc...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações realizar 
um estudo gráfico de funções quadráticas de uma variável real. 
O gráfico da equação canônica da parábola é estudado e é 
modificado por meio das traduções, dos dilations, etc..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
effettuare uno studio grafico sulle funzioni quadratiche di una 
variabile reale. Il grafico dell'equazione canonica della 
parabola è studiato ed è modificato per mezzo di traduzioni, 
dilatazioni, ecc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να πραγματοποιήσει μια γραφική μελέτη των δευτέρου βαθμού 
λειτουργιών μιας πραγματικής μεταβλητής. Η γραφική 
παράσταση της κανονικής εξίσωσης της παραβολής μελετάται και 
τροποποιείται με τη βοήθεια των μεταφράσεων, των διαστολών, 
κ.λπ....</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gipfel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übersetzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Parabel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
